Data Table

ID Last Name First Name Email Actions
{{ item.id }} {{ item.lastName }} {{ item.firstName }} {{ item.email }}
import {Component, Inject, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; import {Employee} from "./interface/employee"; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fetch-data.component.css'] }) export class FetchDataComponent implements OnInit { data!: Employee[] | null; selectedItem!: Employee | null; newItem!: Employee; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadData(); } initNewItemForm() { this.newItemForm = this.fb.group({ newLastName: ['', Validators.required], newFirstName: ['', Validators.required], newEmail: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]] }); } loadData() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'emploee/getAll') .subscribe(data => { this.data = data; }); } addItem() { this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'emploee/add', this.newItem) .subscribe(() => { console.log('Item created successfully'); this.loadData(); // Reload the data after adding a new item this.newItem = { id: 0, firstName : "", lastName : "", email: "" } ; // Clear the newItem object }, error => { console.error('Error creating item:', error); }); } editItem(item: Employee) { if (this.selectedItem !== item) { this.selectedItem = item; } else { this.selectedItem = null; } } saveItem(item: Employee) { this.http.put(this.baseUrl + 'emploee/update', item) .subscribe(() => { console.log('Item updated successfully'); this.selectedItem = null; }, error => { console.error('Error updating item:', error); }); } cancelEdit() { this.selectedItem = null; } deleteItem(item: any) { // Implement logic to delete an item } }
